config: We are proud to announce the launch of our new membership program designed exclusively for legal professionals: Justia Connect. Members are invited to share, learn, save, and grow with resources and benefits designed to help you achieve your professional goals.

As a special thank you for being one of the first members of our Justia Connect community, we are offering a limited-time discount on Justia Premium Placements! Visit your Justia Connect dashboard to claim your offer and learn more about this new membership.
